properties.comment: Temporal Sequenced Rewrites Test Cases for Aggregation queries
properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SEQUENCED TEMPORAL ( SELECT count(*) AS c FROM (SELECT count(*) AS BOO, A FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) GROUP BY A) a ) ) sub WHERE c = 0;
SELECT * FROM (SEQUENCED TEMPORAL ( SELECT count(*) AS c FROM (SELECT count(*) AS BOO, A FROM TEMP_TEST WITH TIME(T_BEGIN, T_END) GROUP BY A) a ) ) sub WHERE T_E < 2;
